text.value: Kama huu ni udhurio wako wa kwanza, ingiza idadi za mara ngapi mtoto kachukuliwa vipimo vya uzito. Kama ni utembeleo wa pili na kuendelea, andika hapa 2 alafu nukuu uzito wa kwanza na wa mwisho kutoka kwenye kadi
Kama alipata chanjo lakini tarehe haikuandikwa jaza 6/6/1966
Idadi ya miaka iliokamilika aliyosoma mama:
Tarehe ya kupewa dozi ya pili ya VITAMIN A
Baada ya kuzaliwa, ilichukua dakika ngapi kumnyonyesha ziwa la mama mtoto?
Kama alipata chanjo lakini tarehe haikuandikwa jaza 6/6/1966
Ni miezi mingapi imepita tangu chandarua kiwekewe dawa?
Kama alipata chanjo lakini tarehe haikuandikwa jaza 6/6/1966
Kama alipata chanjo lakini tarehe haikuandikwa jaza 6/6/1966
VITAMIN A dozi ya pili kapewa?
Tarehe ya kupewa dozi ya kwanza ya VITAMIN A
Kuna kadi ya clinic au daftari?
Chagua kati ya Dakika, Masaa, au Siku/Masiku. Swali lifuatalo utafafanua zaidi
Tarehe ya kupewa chanjo ya surua
Kama alipata chanjo lakini tarehe haikuandikwa jaza 6/6/1966
Kama alipata chanjo lakini tarehe haikuandikwa jaza 6/6/1966
Kama alipata chanjo lakini tarehe haikuandikwa jaza 6/6/1966
Ni miezi au miaka tangu chandarua kiwekewe dawa?
Je, mtoto alilala ndani ya chandarua kwa usiku uliyopita?
Je, mtoto amepimwa angalau mara moja?
Kama alipata chanjo lakini tarehe haikuandikwa jaza 6/6/1966
Kama alipata chanjo lakini tarehe haikuandikwa jaza 6/6/1966
Baada ya kuzaliwa, ilichukua masaa mangapi kumnyonyesha ziwa la mama mtoto?
VITAMIN A dozi ya kwanza kapewa?
Kama alipata chanjo lakini tarehe haikuandikwa jaza 6/6/1966
Baada ya kuzaliwa, ilichukua muda gani kumnyonyesha ziwa la mama mtoto?
Baada ya kuzaliwa, ilichukua siku ngapi kumnyonyesha ziwa la mama mtoto?
Ni miaka mingapi imepita tangu chandarua kiwekewe dawa?

Uzito wa mtoto uchukuliwe kutoka kwenye kadi ya kliniki. Kwa utembeleo wa kwanza andika uzito wote kama ulivyoandikwa kwenye kadi. Kwa utembeleo wa pili na kuendelea andkika uzito wa kwanza na wa mwisho.
Kama alipata chanjo lakini tarehe haikuandikwa jaza 6/6/1966
Je, mama wa mtoto yupo hai?
If this is your first visit, enter the TOTAL number of weight entries found on the card. On subsequent visits enter 2 and then proceed to input the FIRST and LAST weight measurement
If vaccinated but date is not available, enter 6/6/1966
Total number of years of education for the mother:

Choose between Minutes, Hours, or Day/s. The question which follows this one gives you a chance to elaborate

Did the child sleep under a mosquito net last night?

How long after birth did it take before the child first breast fed from the mother?
How many days after birth did it take before the child first breast fed from the mother?
How many years since the mosquito net last got treated?
The childs weight should be taken from the clinic card. For a 1st visit, enter ALL the childs weights just as it is on the card. For subsequent visits, just enter the first weight and last weight.
If vaccinated but date is not available, enter 6/6/1966
